title: OPEN HOUSE SUNDAY 8.7.22.Newly Remodeled NO FEE  Near Tufts $2,750/mo.
posting_body: ['OPEN HOUSE SUNDAY 8.7.22', 'FROM 230 TO 4PM.', 'Newly renovated kitchen, bathroom and beautiful hard wood floors, 2 bedroom apartment unit in condominium building, with off-street parking, laundry facilities in the building.', 'Brand new appliances: oven, refrigerator, dishwasher, disposal.', 'Located on Main Street in Medford, convenient within walking distance to Tufts and close access to routes 93 and 2.', ' Public transportation is close and there are plenty of amenities including stores and restaurants within walking distance.', ' Available 8/1!', "1st & last month's rent required, sec.", 'dep.', 'negotiable.', 'No fee, rental by owner.', 'No Smoking.', 'Year lease minimum.', 'Please email to arrange a showing.', '297 Main St is an apartment located in Middlesex County and the 02155 ZIP Code.']
